title: [RESOLVED] Login Issues - 9/1/2015
body:
Hi Summoners,

We are aware of some players experiencing connectivity issues, especially during the logon process. We're currently investigating and will update this thread with more info when it is available.

replies.body:
Guys this worked for me:

1. Go to the right of your task bar and find your Internet connection icon, right click and go to Network Sharing Centre.
2. Find the "adapter settings". For Windows 8 it's on the panel on the left, not sure for 7 or Mac. 
3. Find your current connection, right click on it, go to Properties
4. Find "Internet Protocol Version 4", and go into its Properties.
5. In the DNS Section, instead of automatic, check "Use the following DNS server addresses"
6. Prefered DNS server: 8.8.8.8
    Alternate DNS server: 8.8.4.4
7. Click OK, exit the settings and try launching LoL again.

> [{quoted}](name=Mariius,realm=OCE,application-id=3fteLeTW,discussion-id=K6yHzQIK,comment-id=0012,timestamp=2015-01-10T09:54:26.909+0000)

> 7. Click OK, exit the settings and try launching LoL again.

it worked for me.

Hello, I still got login issues, no matter what i do, it keeps telling me: An error has occurred check the logs for more info, and when i check the logs it has nothing worng at all, it just stops working and crashes.
Im currently playing in a mac OSX Yosemite 10.10.1

FOR MAC OS X ONLY: Hi guys, had a similar issue, solved it in a similar way. 

Go to SYSTEM PREFERENCES > NETWORK > Choose your network, and click ADVANCED > DNS > Then click the plus (+) sign, and add 8.8.4.4 and 8.8.8.8 to your list. APPLY, and voila! That was the only thing that worked after fresh installs, opened packages, and many restarts. 

Good luck!

hello every body! for some reason LOL  has issues launching after a new patch while running on a wifi connection.
once I changed my connection to Ethernet (running an Ethernet cable directly from the modem to your pc) it ran/went past the launch facility and onto the login.
previously the program would fail to open past the launch no mater how many times repeated.

I hope this method helps a few summoners during the patching scenario!
Thanks for your time!
YESS AFTER A LOT OF TRIES I GOT IT. IT TOOK ME SO LONG, I JUST KEEP CLOSING AND OPENING I KNOW IT SOUNDS DUMB AND TAKES LONG BUT IT'S SIMPLE AND WORKED FOR ME{{summoner:30}}

Just started having issues as of May 25, 2015 - I had the unable to connect to PvP.net issue after a few tries it logs on but before that it closes my app after that error.

The fix is:
System Preferences > Security & Privacy > Firewall > Firewall Options > Look for League of Legends
If it has a red dot next to it, that means it's blocking incoming connections. Click on that red dot and change to allow incoming connections. No idea why it changed itself, but it did. 

FYI I'm using OS X Yosemite 10.10.3
after the last patch my lol launcher doesn't work anymore, i deleted lol and redownload again but it's useless. i don't know what to do now pls help!{{item:1076}}

Some have solved it but the most of the ones who haven't claim to be TPG users.

Could this be our ISP's problem?
